content.en: Signal processing advancements: Researchers have developed various algorithms to estimate the direction of arrival (DOA) and polarization of signals in different array configurations. These algorithms include the use of fourth-order cumulants, trilinear decomposition, parallel factor analysis, maximum likelihood estimation, dimension reduction multiple signal classification, one-dimensional spatial-smoothing, sparse signal reconstruction, invariance property of noise subspace, root-MUSIC algorithm, sparse signal representation, manifold separation, thresholding technique, triple coprime array structure, fourth-order cumulant reduced-dimensional Capon algorithm, spatial polarimetric time-frequency distributions, and optimized elemental orientations. These algorithms enable accurate estimation of DOA and polarization, enhancing signal processing capabilities in various applications.
content.da: Fremskridt inden for signalbehandling: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer til at estimere ankomstretningen (DOA) og polariseringen af signaler i forskellige array-konfigurationer. Disse algoritmer inkluderer brugen af fjerdeordens kumulanter, trilinear dekomposition, parallel faktor analyse, maksimum likelihood estimering, dimensionsreduktion multiple signal klassifikation, endimensionel spatial-udglatning, sparsom signal rekonstruktion, invarians-egenskab af støj subspace, root-MUSIC algoritme, sparsom signal repræsentation, manifold-separation, tærskel teknik, tredobbelt koprime array struktur, fjerdeordens kumulant reduceret-dimension Capon algoritme, spatial polarimetrisk tids-frekvens distributioner og optimerede elementære orienteringer. Disse algoritmer muliggør præcis estimering af DOA og polarisering, hvilket forbedrer signalbehandlingskapaciteterne i forskellige applikationer.
